parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the components; 0-based index

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Configuration for which to count components in top-level only BOMs; specify an empty string for parts only and indented BOMs

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of components in the specified row

title: IBomTableAnnotation.IGetComponents2
description: Gets the components in the specified row for the specified configuration in this BOM table annotation.
signature:
Component2 IGetComponents2( 
   System.Int32
RowIndex
,
   System.String
Configuration
,
   System.Int32
Count
)

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the components; 0-based index

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Configuration for which to count components in top-level only BOMs; specify an empty string for parts only and indented BOMs

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of components in the specified row

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of components in the specified row for the specified configuration VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IBomTableAnnotation::GetComponentsCount2
to get the value of Count.
